column5: This Airbnb site is ideally located in an historic Hill Country town. An hour north of Austin, the state's capital, and an hour south of Waco, Killeen is a military community in the heart of Central Texas and adjacent to Fort Hood, the largest military installation in the world. From this property, with its dual home and hotel-like appeal, Airbnb guests will enjoy convenient access to the best Texas has to offer.
